author: Sharon Steimle
title: Enjoy extra savings at Stein Mart’s Columbus Day sale this weekend
text:
Save more than ever at Stein Mart's Columbia Day sale Photo courtesy of anitapeppers. Morgue File image archive. Enjoy extra savings off already discounted prices at Stein Mart’s Columbus Day sale through Monday, October 12. This is your chance to save more than ever on women’s casual and Boutique collections, career and casual sweaters, dresses and skirts, tops and denim. Choose your favorites from an amazing selection of knit and woven tops, crochet and lace tops, asymmetric and duster-length sweaters and V Cristina Boutique styles. Add the finishing touches with fashion handbags for $19.96 and crystal accent bangle watches for only $9.96. Use Stein Mart’s coupons to save 20% off any one sale item, 50% off your entire purchase of home Red Dot clearance and 75% off your entire purchase of Blue Slash clearance.
Make a statement at the office in a United States Sweaters asymmetrical colorblocked pullover tunic and slim black slacks. The sweater features a crimson top and sleeves, a wide gray diagonal band running from the waistline to below the hip and a black bottom that falls to a deep dip on the left side. Done in a soft rayon and polyester knit, the brilliant autumn colors, figure-flattering style and runway-fresh design combine to give you the ultimate in comfort and versatility. Add height to your slender silhouette with black dress booties and carry a foliage red shoulder tote for all the essentials.
For a soft, feminine look pair a white lace overlay top with slim black slacks. A pretty scoop neckline frames your face while sheer lace sleeves and a scalloped lace hemline set off the intricately woven lace pattern. The top falls to hip length, making it easy to wear and flattering to all figure types. Keep the delicate appeal with black ankle strap heels and a few slim gold bangles or a black crystal accent bangle watch. If you like, add a bit of color with a crimson or gold satchel to slip discreetly under your desk.
When the weekend comes, rely on your Earl Jeans denim and a long sleeve plaid shirt to go everywhere it takes you. Classic, comfortable and versatile, this winning duo is sure to be a wardrobe staple. Update your look by tying the skirt at the waist or layering it over a coordinating bright cami for a pop of color. Slip on brown Life Stride tall shaft boots for walking, sightseeing, errands or shopping. Carry a large black and tan fashion handbag and take along chic tortoiseshell sunglasses. More Columbus Day sales you may want to shop feature:
30-50% off ladies’ casual collections 30% off ladies’ Boutique career collections 30% off ladies’ dresses 30% off ladies’ sweaters 30% off Famous Maker ladies’ career collections 30-50% off Athleisure and casual related ladies’ separates 50% off ladies’ career and casual knit and woven tops 40% off ladies’ Boutique novelty tops 40% off ladies’ Boutique V Cristina collection apparel 50% off ladies’ fashion scarves 30% off Gabrielle K ladies’ fashion jewelry To see Stein Mart’s complete selection of Columbia Day sales or to place an order online, visit Stein Mart . Stein Mart is located at 4840 Forest Dr. and 1120 Bower Pkwy . in Columbia and 934 N Lake Dr . in Lexington. Enter your zip code for directions to the store nearest you.
As always, maximize you style and minimize your spending~
